text: For the director of music. To \i1 the tune of  "The Lily of the Covenant". A miktam of David. For teaching. When he fought Aram Naharaim and Aram Zobah, and when Joab returned and struck down twelve thousand Edomites in the Valley of Salt.\i0  You have rejected us, O God, and burst forth upon us; you have been angryâ€”now restore us!
